metadata.name: Data Exfiltration to Unsanctioned Apps
metadata.comment: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user or IP address uses an app that is not sanctioned to perform an activity that resembles an attempt to exfiltrate information from your organization.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('securitycompliancecenter') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('data exfiltration to unsanctioned apps') AND lower(actor.authorizations.decision) = lower('success'))

output.summary: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user or IP address uses an app that is not sanctioned to perform an activity that resembles an attempt to exfiltrate information from your organization.
